title: AiA
text:
AiA is an optimistic Sci-Fi novel about the awakening of an AI created only with generative AI tools. It is a proof of concept which should help me to understand the current status of different applications.

title: Hope

Hope is a short introduction of three different characters and their hope that AiA could help them to provide a solution to safe humanity.
